helpBlock.redirect: The URL that the resolution service will redirect to after it resolves a hub key for an asset associated with this source ID.
helpBlock.refLinks: Link to an external page containing information about an asset. Supports optional URL variable 'source_id', e.g. https://example.com/{source_id}
helpBlock.payment: Link to pay for an asset. Supports optional URL variable 'source_id', e.g. https://example.com/{source_id}. If a 'source_id' is used please specify the 'source_id_type'
